reviewText: Bruce, Dane and Ry seem like they had way to much fun making this film. Psyches me up for those shortboard ripper sessions! Soundtrack is awesome, surfing is A+ and lifestyle stuff is cool too.

The film isn't very long, but it does have loads of funny and crazy scenes in it. Everytime I watch it, I notice a new funny/crazy thing I somehow missed the previous times. The surfing and locations are good, and the film is entertaining. Wished it was a little longer.
A great movie, beautifully shot and stunningly edited. A solid edition to any collection and even a great starter DVD for people interested in the sport and the lifestyle.
